thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: KAYE MOREHEN

author: KAYE MOREHEN
title: KAYE MOREHEN
text: Zodee is great - the website is easy to search, the service is prompt and the returns process makes it easy to try new things - its painless to return if it's not right. They are my reference point - if I can't find it on Zodee, I know I won't get it anywhere else! I'm over department stores not having my size, the queues and mess of their change rooms, and staff that don't know what they're talking about (if you can find anyone!). This is so much better.
